languages.text: "Еще как знаю. Я б рассказал вам про этого человека в подробностях, да подходящие слова негоже произносить на похоронах! Это, Ваша Светлость, Денз Канистра, в иные годы известный как один из самых отъявленных пиратов {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}".

"Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Еще как знаю. Я б рассказал вам про этого человека в подробностях, да подходящие слова негоже произносить на похоронах! Это, Ваша Светлость, Денз Канистра, в иные годы известный как один из самых отъявленных пиратов {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in Koronus."

"Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in Koronus."

"Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the Koronus Expanse."

"Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the Koronus Expanse."

"Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

languages.text: “认识吗？我甚至可以告诉您关于这个人的一切，但那些话恐怕就不怎么适合在葬礼上说了！大人，这个人叫‘油罐’丹兹，当年是{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}最为臭名昭著的海盗之一。”
languages.original_text: "Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “认识吗？我甚至可以告诉您关于这个人的一切，但那些话恐怕就不怎么适合在葬礼上说了！大人，这个人叫‘油罐’丹兹，当年是{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}最为臭名昭著的海盗之一。”

languages.text: «¿Cómo no reconocerlo? Le daría todos los detalles sobre él, pero ¡mis palabras no serían apropiadas para un funeral! Mi{mf|lord|lady}, se trata de Denz Bidones, conocido antaño como uno de los piratas más temidos de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo no reconocerlo? Le daría todos los detalles sobre él, pero ¡mis palabras no serían apropiadas para un funeral! Mi{mf|lord|lady}, se trata de Denz Bidones, conocido antaño como uno de los piratas más temidos de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».

languages.text: 「それはもう！この男の遍歴を今ここでお話しすることもできますが、葬式にふさわしくない言葉ばかり羅列してしまいそうなので控えさせていただく！彼の名前はジェリカン・デンツ…生前は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}でもっとも悪名高い海賊だと言われていた男です、陛下」
languages.original_text: "Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「それはもう！この男の遍歴を今ここでお話しすることもできますが、葬式にふさわしくない言葉ばかり羅列してしまいそうなので控えさせていただく！彼の名前はジェリカン・デンツ…生前は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}でもっとも悪名高い海賊だと言われていた男です、陛下」

languages.text: "Und ob! Ich könnte Euch alles über ihn erzählen, aber meine Worte wären für eine Bestattung unangebracht! Das, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ist Kanister Denz, einst bekannt als einer der berüchtigtsten Piraten der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Und ob! Ich könnte Euch alles über ihn erzählen, aber meine Worte wären für eine Bestattung unangebracht! Das, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ist Kanister Denz, einst bekannt als einer der berüchtigtsten Piraten der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}."

languages.text: « Oh oui ! Je pourrais vous en raconter de belles sur son compte, mais les mots que je me verrais contraint d'employer ne seraient guère appropriés à des funérailles ! Cet homme, Votre Seigneurie, est Jerrycan Denz, l'un des pirates les plus célèbres des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} à son époque. »
languages.original_text: "Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Oh oui ! Je pourrais vous en raconter de belles sur son compte, mais les mots que je me verrais contraint d'employer ne seraient guère appropriés à des funérailles ! Cet homme, Votre Seigneurie, est Jerrycan Denz, l'un des pirates les plus célèbres des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} à son époque. »

languages.text: "Tanımaz olur muyum? Size bu adamın şecerisini okurdum lakin kullanacağım sözcükler cenaze ortamına hiç uygun kaçmaz. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu şahıs zamanında {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} kötülüğüyle nam salmış korsanlardan biri olan Bidon Denz."
languages.original_text: "Do I! I would tell you all about this man, but the words I'd use would be improper for a funeral! This, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, is Jerrycan Denz, known back in the day as one of the most notorious pirates in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Tanımaz olur muyum? Size bu adam hakkında pek çok şey anlatabilirim ama ne yeri ne de zamanı. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu kişi zamanında {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde kötülüğüyle nam salmış korsanlardan biri olarak bilinen Bidon Denz."
